org.raistlic.common.config.converter

Class ConfigConverters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.raistlic.common.config.converter.ConfigConverters

  • public final class ConfigConverters
extends java.lang.Object
    The static factory methods that exports converters between different types of values and String , to be used in Config related implementations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Codec<java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.String> booleanConverter()
      The method returns a singleton, stateless Codec<Boolean, String> instance, which will allow null values to pass through, and will throw ConfigValueConvertException in case of a value conversion failure.
      static Codec<java.lang.Byte,java.lang.String> byteConverter()
      The method returns a singleton, stateless Codec<Character, String> instance, which will allow null values to pass through, and will throw ConfigValueConvertException in case of a value conversion failure.
      static Codec<java.lang.Character,java.lang.String> charConverter()
      The method returns a singleton, stateless Codec<Character, String> instance, which will allow null values to pass through, and will throw ConfigValueConvertException in case of a value conversion failure.
      static Codec<java.lang.Double,java.lang.String> doubleConverter()
      The method returns a singleton, stateless Codec<Double, String> instance, which will allow null values to pass through, and will throw ConfigValueConvertException in case of a value conversion failure.
      static Codec<java.lang.Float,java.lang.String> floatConverter()
      The method returns a singleton, stateless Codec<Float, String> instance, which will allow null values to pass through, and will throw ConfigValueConvertException in case of a value conversion failure.
      static Codec<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> intConverter()
      The method returns a singleton, stateless Codec<Integer, String> instance, which will allow null values to pass through, and will throw ConfigValueConvertException in case of a value conversion failure.
      static Codec<java.lang.Long,java.lang.String> longConverter()
      The method returns a singleton, stateless Codec<Long, String> instance, which will allow null values to pass through, and will throw ConfigValueConvertException in case of a value conversion failure.
      static Codec<java.lang.Short,java.lang.String> shortConverter()
      The method returns a singleton, stateless Codec<Short, String> instance, which will allow null values to pass through, and will throw ConfigValueConvertException in case of a value conversion failure.
